doc.title: Mojave
doc.plot: Losing himself in the desert after fighting with his boyfriend, Andrew wanders the blistering heat of the Mojave, dreaming of relief for his denied urges. Three erotic mirages bring him closer to the oasis of his own heart than he or his lover could have expected! He dreams of the handsome tribesman who nurtures him with water and fruit - then of two young men playfully wrestling under a cool waterfall. Finally, he dreams of an angel, who lifts him from the heat of the desert to the cool bliss of the sky - only to find out the surprising identity of the angel! Transformed by each encounter, Andrew returns to camp and truly makes love to his boyfriend for the first time.
